content: 3 75 4 from underarm or desired length the next round adjusts the stitch count on sizes b d e f and g for the bottom sleeve ribbing k2 k2tog knit to last 4 sts ssk k2 64 68 76 80 84 92 104 108 sts 4 bottom sleeve ribbing change to needle two sizes smaller than gauge needle for working small circumferences if you are changing colors for the ribbing knit one round in ribbing color before starting the ribbing round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round work round 1 a total of 5 times bind off loosely in pattern finishing weave in loose ends block to finished measurements schematic a = chest 32 36 39 25 43 25 47 25 50 75 54 57 25 b = sleeve from underarm to bottom of ribbing 3 5 3 5 3 5 4 4 4 25 4 25 4 5 c = body from underarm to bottom of ribbing 12 5 d = sleeve circumference 10 75 11 75 12 75 13 75 14 25 15 75 17 75 18 e = yoke depth 7 5 8 8 25 9 9 25 10 10 25 10 5 bustleton tee ©2023 erika flory kidknits@flory com all rights reserved for personal use only this pattern may not be reproduced for business trade or sale 5
